website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality lounger most noted for its wide assortment of colors and fun prints.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors and funky prints
Comes with a stake and patch kit
Material doesn't heat up in the sun or make noise when you move around
cons: In addition to having a difficult inflation process, some found that this option loses air too easily

customer_reviews.title: This high priced product is a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: It comes with little or no instruction. It does not hold air. I filled it up 4 times with vacuum cleaner and even folded the end befor securing it and it does not hold air.. I was going to use it in my pickup truck bed to take snooze.. I should have bought a cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Dupont

customer_reviews.title: Very cool lounging chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest thing ever!!! The kids love it, they like trying to fill it with air. This is the neatest thing to sit on. Very easy to inflate. I have watched a lot of videos on how to fill this before it came in. Im very happy with my purchase. Very comfortable to lay on or just to sit on.Its snowing outside or i would have pics of it outside. But this spring watch out cause my chillbo will get lots of use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond and Lisa

customer_reviews.title: We had so much fun inflating this bag!
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun inflating this bag! The day it arrived the kids were excited to try it out, but it was raining outside, so we decided to run up and down the hallway to see if we could inflate it that way. We were surprised that it actually worked! If we could do it running down our inside hallway, I can only imagine how easy it is to inflate outside with a nice wind. It seems really well made, it's super easy to inflate/deflate and pack away, and the colors are really nice. We're all very pleased and are looking forward to taking it on our next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These things are GREAT! Look like a fool trying to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are GREAT! Look like a fool trying to get the air in the damn thing. But if you miraculously get enough air, they’re comfortable and perfect for hunting, fishing, camping, concerts, you name it, you can lounge while doing it, comfortably and stylishly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only on windy days-maybe
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this but it’s only easy to inflate on a windy day. We tried the billow baggings method and it doesn’t inflate enough to keep me afloat. I was in it for an hr and started touching the ground. Also water has collected in between the material and plastic from being in the rain. I think it’s going to mold 😢
customer_reviews.author: Man D

customer_reviews.title: Terribly difficult to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are tall and very athletic, and have space to vigorously run around, it is very difficult to get this product to inflate. And if you don’t get it inflated all the way, it is very uncomfortable and awkward. I got it to somewhat inflate on a third, frustrated try. I would suggest practicing at home before you get to your destination.
customer_reviews.author: Vatsug

customer_reviews.title: Super cool and portable lounger!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and easy to use, took it up to Mammoth and inflated in a few minutes (though there is a bit of a learning curve on how to get air in it). The chair is comfy and had it on dirt and minor rocks without a problem! Super portable and definitely a good buy, I would recommend to anyone looking for a easy chair to bring along camping or to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid blow up chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid blow up chair for the beach or camping. They can all be a little difficult to get the hang of blowing them up, but they are comfortable and this seems pretty quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chester629

customer_reviews.title: Cool lounger
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for lounging outside or inside! Pretty easy to inflate and comes with a bag to store it!
customer_reviews.author: Kris22

customer_reviews.title: Take it anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camo lounger for my husband and he really likes the design and how easy it is to use. It's also super easy to deflate and put away, making it one of his favorite things to take to our kids soccer games
customer_reviews.author: Shortee231

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my camping gear!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! I took it to a Camping trip with a huge group of friends and everyone keep asking me about it. I actually sprained my ankle and it was the perfect place to hang out while keeping my foot elevated. Make sure you watch the YouTube video on how to fill it up and practice home before trying to do it in front of people...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Losing air
customer_reviews.text: We liked this for a couple of days. Don’t know what happened, but it seems to be losing air very qucikly now. Didn’t perfect inflating since I don’t want to go outside in the freezing cold, so we filled it with a fan. I also see seams ripping already. I feel like this was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: CindyDM

customer_reviews.title: Good price - as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! So far so good! Used a few times and had lots of fun. Very cool design and logo is hilarious - pockets are useful, and fits well back into carrying/ storage bag every time. Will buy more as gifts - due to reasonable price, fun patterns, and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Huge lounger
customer_reviews.text: Initially we were concerned that the Chillbo didn't provide enough support to keep our younger children from falling through the cracks. Then we decided to read the directions and realized it was reversible and they were sitting on the sofa side vs lounge side. They love it as it keeps them from falling through... Only thing it deflates faster than another brand we own which stays inflated for days our Chillbo deflates pretty quick other than that it's nice
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, saw these bad boys at firefly festival ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, saw these bad boys at firefly festival and couldn't pass up an opportunity to own one. They are extremely comfortable and durable, they will make your festival experience great! Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Foltzilla

customer_reviews.title: Would not hold air!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband on his birthday and it would not hold air at all! I had to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Williams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not long enough for my 6ft4" grandson---I sent back and bought Don Poolio float!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Jennings

customer_reviews.title: these suck had everyone i know try to fill up and ...
customer_reviews.text: these suck had everyone i know try to fill up and none of us could do a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bellmay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with one of the items and Izzy had a new one headed my way within only 2 emails. Easy to work with team who stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Piper

customer_reviews.title: Price is worth it with the lifetime gaurentee
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflat once you figure it out. No need to run just a few quick straight steps works pretty good. Very comfortable and material is good quality. Didn't receive a stake with the chillbo baggins not sure if I was supposed or not.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Our family loves our chillbo it’s fun to inflate and comes in some fun colors that ...
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves our chillbo it’s fun to inflate and comes in some fun colors that add some character to our camp site.
customer_reviews.author: Karl J.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service-sent another in no time
customer_reviews.text: First one was defective. Great customer service-sent another in no time. And this one is going on a year! I don’t see it lasting longer than that. Think you’ll need to replace these. It is only nylon and plastic-so keep that in mind. But I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Inner liner is thinner than ziplock freezer bag weight.
customer_reviews.text: Defective. Large holes in inner liner. Wouldn't stay inflated. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs wind and lots of wind!!
customer_reviews.text: Took to California on beach and didn’t inflate st all camping. Sitting in the garage now waiting for summer to try again !!
customer_reviews.author: katharine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not inflatable you have to run and catch wind in the 2 big air chambers.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Kruzick

customer_reviews.title: This is a really cool and fun piece to have for the summer
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool and fun piece to have for the summer, I have already gotten use out of it. Kids love it and its very comfortable and I can sit in it with them both. Only negative is it is hard to inflate without wind
customer_reviews.author: Savanah M.

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold air
customer_reviews.text: So wanted to love this but it never holds the air even after following all instructions. After you sit on it for 5 min you have to get back up twist the end more and it slowly will deflat again. Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: maureen schumacher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my Chillbo!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my Chillbo! I didn't fully appreciate it until I brought it to a four day music festival, and let me tell you, the most comfortable parts of my weekend were when I was sitting in this. Very good customer service, very easy to inflate, and the side pockets are a helpful addition! I bought the orange and blue lounger and got so many compliments from people walking by. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MassConsumer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is all that and a bag of chips ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is all that and a bag of chips!! My son can't wait for summer to use it on the beach!!
customer_reviews.author: MilitaryMom09063

customer_reviews.title: comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent customer service. We bought the lounger for Christmas, had a issue and the company was was quick to respond and took care of everything. We love the lounger, it's comfy and has many uses. Also, this company cares about it's customers and wouldn't hesitate to buy another product
customer_reviews.author: cherylwhitehead

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Hard to inflate even on mountain top. Works well with a fan.
customer_reviews.author: julia443

customer_reviews.title: These are just great! I'd been on the fence for awhile about ...
customer_reviews.text: These are just great! I'd been on the fence for awhile about purchasing one. So glad I did. The follow up after purchase has been fantastic. Definitely watch the video on how to inflate. It will save you from literally running around in circles. I had mine so perfect last night on our deck. I didn't want to get out to make dinner! Buy One, Now!!!
customer_reviews.author: shawn seamons

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My daughter loved hers. We have not used the other 2 yet but will soon when we go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to fill....  but easy to pack!
customer_reviews.text: I need to be taller to fill it well, but i just roll it up real tight and relax.....
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson as part of his birthday. He LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t care how many times u read instructions it’s impossible ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t care how many times u read instructions it’s impossible to get filled with air . We then used leaf blower to fill with air and now there is a leak somewhere and stays inflated for 1 minute
customer_reviews.author: Christina roberts

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome BUT you need wind - the video tutorial shows ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome BUT you need wind - the video tutorial shows a man doing it effortlessly without wind - that is not the case to beware
customer_reviews.author: Houndmoon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY OTHER INFLATABLE COUCH PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: Top notch quality product compared to similar products. Price is fair for the material quality and guaranteed warranty. Customer service was incredible and I had a seemless and easy time with this product. Would recommend this over the other wind bag products.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Singer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product.. its my go to for the beach.. mahalo
customer_reviews.author: R-Nel

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These don't hold air and totally fell apart in the pool. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: merks

customer_reviews.title: This one seems to be better. More comfortable too
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a bunch of lesser brands. This one seems to be better. More comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dohanich

customer_reviews.title: Seats taken
customer_reviews.text: Came in clutch at a concert. Felt bad my friends didn’t have one. Not bad enough to give up my sat though! We
customer_reviews.author: Angie Long

customer_reviews.title: Husband extremely delighted. Having trouble getting him out of it haha
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for camping. Husband extremely delighted. Having trouble getting him out of it haha. Prompt delivery. Wonderful follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Inger

customer_reviews.title: Strong and swaggy!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a bunch of different inflatable loungers out there, but none have the level of construction as the Chillbo. I feel like you could pull this thing behind a boat, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably should only use outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't inflate it using their method and had to use an air pump. That might be because I'm indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Nasheed

customer_reviews.title: Must have for active families!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! My 7 year old and I enjoyed it at a recent outdoor music festival-best seats in the house! Easy to set up even with no wind! Easy take down as well! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Camacho-Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: ... be making a complete fool of yourself but we love our inflatable
customer_reviews.text: My advice if you have never inflated one of these watch a video on YouTube or you will be making a complete fool of yourself but we love our inflatable loungers
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Burton

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing! We love them
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! We love them! Plan on using them while camping but our kids are using them in the house! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Minden T.

customer_reviews.title: It is not as easy as it looks to fill with air but after ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not as easy as it looks to fill with air but after I got it filled it worked great! Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality inflatable! Loses air a little quicker than expected, but I am trying out another brand and it keeps air better than that one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wiersdorf

customer_reviews.title: It’s so cool! A good float for beach
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cool ! A good float for beach !!! I like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as they make it. I believe mine is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, and works great once you get the hang ...
customer_reviews.text: Every time we take this to the beach people ask about it. Looks cool, and works great once you get the hang of inflating it (Watch the Video!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great for right now use, not for overnight.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the DR with a severe camo problem. Used it on a camping trip, and she decided to sleep in it. She was in the ground by morning all three nights she tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but if a seam fails on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but if a seam fails on the outer skin, it won't last long. Mine showed up with an already unraveled seam and it looks like my only option is to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: It was fun for about 2 weeks and we just put it ...
customer_reviews.text: A pain in the ass to running around to fill this bugger with air. It was fun for about 2 weeks and we just put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: BEST OF LUCK GETTING AIR INTO IT
customer_reviews.text: Good luck getting air into it without looking like your part of a 3 ring circus. Returning it ASAP
customer_reviews.author: KJSDAD619

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. Tried to use it twice on windy day's With no luck getting it inflated. Very disappointed. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just really hard to inflate and keep inflated. Kids have basically given up on trying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy with the way this works Not sure if I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with the way this works Not sure if I am missing something. But never inflates fully
customer_reviews.author: JOSHNARAYAN

customer_reviews.title: The product is not good. The seals for the lounger do not stay ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is not good. The seals for the lounger do not stay sealed when you sit on the lounger. When I emailed the seller, they said there must be a tear in the inner lining. Mind you it was brand new out of the package, and they wanted me to patch it. They did offer to send a replacement, however, they wanted me to try and patch it first for the environment. it is not torn or leaking, the seals are inferior and are designed poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to inflate unless you have a strong wind blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Vivien

customer_reviews.title: Can't stay inflated!
customer_reviews.text: This chair had a hole in it so it would not stay inflated. This item was only available to be returned rather than exchanged and when I went to repurchase, the price had increased $20. This happened with the other Chillbo Baggins 2.0 that I purchased at the exact same time in a different print. Not worth it! Buy a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Chillbo Baggins Inflatable Lounger
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of this Chillbo Baggins Inflatable brand lounger for a birthday gift. We followed directions for catching air and all was well. Within one hour one of the seams cane apart and was ruined. I sent back and ordered the same lounger again. This time the seams just slowly leak air and go flat. Returning to amazon to purchase a different brand. The second lounger lasted almost a month and now slowly leaks air as well. I hope to return to amazon as it is past the return date. I will be ordering another brand for lounger number two, Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air for long
customer_reviews.text: This was the thing that my son wanted most for Christmas but it doesn't keep the air in. You have to refill every hour or less. It's junk and I'm so sad for my little boy :(
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: He was very disappointed in Santa bringing him this
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 12 year old... So heavy and cumbersome... We can't even get them filled. He was very disappointed in Santa bringing him this!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ciullo

customer_reviews.title: They were nice to have and worked well but by the second ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to take to the Watershed festival. They were nice to have and worked well but by the second day the seams started to tear and now they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dnalloh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I used this one time and it got a hole in it. Very disappointed for the money I spent. Trying to return or get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Flansburg

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Won't stay inflated more than 10 minutes. Too much space between the two sides; you sink straight to the floor no matter how fully it is inflated
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to inflate without wind
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept, love the quality, but sending it back. Without wind, this thing is hopeless to inflate. Tried all the techniques in the video, but they don't provide enough air. The only think that worked was using a hair dryer, and then the results were just OK. I am sending it back and trying a model that provides for a way to use a pump to inflate when you find yourself without wind.
customer_reviews.author: jswest
